abiDocs.name: isAmendedEarlyPurchase
abiDocs.details: Checks whether early purchase is amended

inputs.name: earlyPurchaseIndex
inputs.description: Index number of an early purchase

abiDocs.name: purchasedAmountBy
abiDocs.details: Returns early purchased amount by purchaser's address

abiDocs.name: isInvalidEarlyPurchase
abiDocs.details: Checks whether early purchase is invalid

abiDocs.name: setup
abiDocs.details: Sets up function sets external contract's address

abiDocs.name: amendEarlyPurchase
abiDocs.details: Amends a given early purchase with data

abiDocs.name: loadStarbaseEarlyPurchases
abiDocs.details: Loads early purchases data to StarbaseEarlyPurchaseAmendment contract

abiDocs.name: totalAmountOfEarlyPurchases
abiDocs.details: Returns total amount of raised funds by Early Purchasers
